tool_description: This api provides up-to-date news around the world from sports, entertainment, politics and lots more
name: Real world news api
title: Real world news api

api_list.name: get 2024 politics
api_list.description: this endpoint gets all 2024 politics news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-world-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com/politics/2024"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-world-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://real-world-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com/politics/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-world-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
